name: MapNet
tagline: Genetic and Genomic Variation in Plants, Animals, Humans and Microbes.
body:
# MAPNet 2015

This meeting focuses on the research of genetic and genomic variation in plants, animals, humans and microbes. It will include a diverse range of oral presentations on the results and methodologies from the NZ molecular and statistical genetics and genomics community.Â  The meeting provides a unique chance for New Zealand researchers working on different biological systems to share approaches and expertise.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
